Detailed Description

Class CartesianFaceDoubleConservativeLinearRefine implements conservative linear interpolation for face-centered double patch data defined over a Cartesian mesh. It is derived from the base class hier::RefineOperator. The numerical operations for the interpolation use FORTRAN numerical routines.

See also:
hier::RefineOperator

Member Function Documentation

int SAMRAI::geom::CartesianFaceDoubleConservativeLinearRefine::getOperatorPriority (  )  const [virtual]

The priority of face-centered double conservative linear is 0. It will be performed before any user-defined interpolation operations.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::RefineOperator.

hier::IntVector SAMRAI::geom::CartesianFaceDoubleConservativeLinearRefine::getStencilWidth ( const tbox::Dimension &  dim  )  const [virtual]

The stencil width of the conservative linear interpolation operator is the vector of ones.

Implements SAMRAI::hier::RefineOperator.

void SAMRAI::geom::CartesianFaceDoubleConservativeLinearRefine::refine ( hier::Patch &  fine,
const hier::Patch &  coarse,
const int  dst_component,
const int  src_component,
const hier::BoxOverlap &  fine_overlap,
const hier::IntVector &  ratio 
) const [virtual]

Refine the source component on the coarse patch to the destination component on the fine patch using the face-centered double conservative linear interpolation operator. Interpolation is performed on the intersection of the destination patch and the boxes contained in fine_overlap. It is assumed that the coarse patch contains sufficient data for the stencil width of the refinement operator.

Precondition:
(fine.getDim() == coarse.getDim()) && (fine.getDim() == ratio.getDim())
dynamic_cast<const pdat::FaceOverlap *>(&fine_overlap) != 0
coarse.getPatchData(src_component) is actually a boost::shared_ptr<pdat::FaceData<double> >
fine.getPatchData(dst_component) is actually a boost::shared_ptr<pdat::FaceData<double> >
coarse.getPatchData(src_component)->getDepth() == fine.getPatchData(dst_component)->getDepth()
(fine.getDim().getValue() == 1) || (fine.getDim().getValue() == 2) || (fine.getDim().getValue() == 3)

Implements SAMRAI::hier::RefineOperator.
